code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ModernNavbar=_ref=>{let{className=''}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const location=useLocation();const navItems=[{id:'home',label:'Главная',icon:'H',path:'/',active:location.pathname==='/'||location.pathname==='/home'},{id:'places',label:'Места',icon:'P',path:'/places',active:location.pathname==='/places'},{id:'profile',label:'Профиль',icon:'L',path:'/profile',active:location.pathname==='/profile'}];const handleNavClick=path=>{navigate(path);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"modern-navbar ".concat(className),children:navItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-item ".concat(item.active?'active':''),onClick:()=>handleNavClick(item.path),role:"button",tabIndex:0,onKeyDown:e=>{if(e.key==='Enter'||e.key===' '){handleNavClick(item.path);}},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-icon",children:item.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-label",children:item.label})]},item.id))});};export default ModernNavbar;
